title: Too many levels of RuntimeException nesting on BuildException

labels.name: area/housekeeping
labels.description: Issue type for generalized tasks not related to bugs or enhancements

body:
It doesn't happen always but we are nesting original exceptions into RuntimeExceptions far too aggressively in some cases.

We should probably clean this up and remove the ones that don't have a proper message by special casing RuntimeExceptions to rethrow them without any additional wrapping.

```
java.lang.RuntimeException: 
java.lang.RuntimeException: java.lang.RuntimeException: java.lang.RuntimeException: java.lang.RuntimeException: java.lang.RuntimeException: io.quarkus.builder.BuildException: Build failure: Build failed due to errors
```
